channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Next to bin old Quebec Street, 1st July
item.description:
Old Quebec Street next to bin rubbish bags and litter smells need to clear out as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Quebec Street, Marylebone, London

item.title: Mailman road pavement near junction with Keslake Road, 1st July
item.description:
Random garden dustbin has been left on side of road with no houses and rubbish dumped in it now over spilling. Please remove dustbin and rubbish

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Milman Road, London

item.title: Continued disturbance, 1st July
item.description:
The neighbours disturbed as gate and lock is so noisy it can wake residents up. People going through to allotments at 3:48,5:26. 5:37 am this morning. Can a night lock be fitted to stop this out of hours disturbance.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 295, Old Farm Avenue, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter everyday, 1st July
item.description:
Please can something more permanent be done to address the littering problem in Walford Road, non residents park their cars here to eat kebab from a nearby restaurant without seating and then proceed to simply leave their rubbish on the street occurs daily

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Walford Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sink hole that's getting bigger, 1st July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 40, Dinsdale Road, East Greenwich, London
